channel.title: Podcasts on More Muc Than You Can Handle
channel.description: Recent content in Podcasts on More Muc Than You Can Handle

item.title: Valuable Links - Podcasts
item.author: scottmuc@gmail.com (Scott Muc)
item.description: It’s quite surprising that I haven’t really brought up the topic of podcasts on my blog considering that I’ve been consuming them for almost 10 years! My methods and taste have changed a lot over the years. I want a place to point people when asked about what podcasts I listen to, and with a little more context than just a pure list. Software / Tools A podcast is such a simple concept (from the technical side) that it allows for a lot of tools and applications to be created around the idea.
